title: Banned for no reason
body: I got banned for telling the team how we could win and that we should all group, later i said that MF was being "salty and afking" so we should report her. after the game i got pema banned and this shouldn't be a thing considering all the time and money  i put into the account and the fact that teaching and telling a team how to play shouldn't get me banned without a warning. Considering all the help and effort people like me put into this i should be unbanned it would help a lot in my free time when im not working, please help to try to get me unbanned riot i am currently in the USMC so if you could help that would be amazing :D

So, the first thing I see here is that you are exhibiting a lot of verbal toxicity towards MF.

> Jak147: YO MF DO SOMETHING
Jak147: holy shit youre bad
Jak147: this kid thinks ignorance is funny worst mf ever
Jak147: mf thinks ignorance is funny

Secondly, calling for reports is generally considered harassment. Especially the way in which you are doing it; you are using it to threaten the MF.
> Jak147: report mf salty and bad xD
Jak147: report mf

Finally, remember that previous punishments are taken into account for the severity of your punishment. Even if this chat was just light enough to earn a small chat restriction (it wasn't) it still would have ended up being a perma ban.

I hope this helps explain the ban a little better and you don't feel it is "for no reason". The community as a whole does not tolerate harassment. It is you and your fellow summoners that dictate what is considered acceptable and not acceptable.

RIOT FEEDERSLIVESMATTER. 

So the first thing here is your words towards MF. Though your words are not exceptionally toxic, you should already know that most of the community we created is ignorant and reminding them might hurt their feelings. As for the MF, uhm**** has thrown and fed in several of his previous games, therefore it's important we protect his feelings so frustrated summoners in bronze 1 have to spend more time and money to achieve Silver 5. Thanks for understanding and hopefully you spend money on the next account you create too. We would love to take it, ban you for words, and repeat this process as many times as you feel necessary to subject to.

Punishments are dealt in 4 steps;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban

Asking to mass report a player is harassment, and punishment is calculated per match not report; in other words, it does no good and potentially causes harm. If you were permabanned for just what you said you did, then you've been working up to this tier of punishment for a while already and had a 14 day account ban recently. It takes 3 months for your punishment tier to drop down 1 step.

I suggest posting your reform card.

You didn't get permabanned for saying fuck. I say fuck all the time. Share your reform card(s).
